Item.Text:
1) Draw 2D lines where you need to create sections 2) Select the layer in the plugin where the 2D lines are drawn 3) Use the button to create sections, or create sections and delete lines 4) Sections will be numbered sequentially, starting with the number entered in the "First section number" field 5) The "Consider line direction" option allows you to create sections taking into account the direction of the line, otherwise they are always generated "from bottom to right"
Note. Sections will be created on the current file. All activated files (including passive ones) will be visible in the sections.
